price: и они мисле, као што и ви мислите, да Аллах никога неће да оживи.
arabic: وَأَنَّهُمۡ ظَنُّواْ كَمَا ظَنَنتُمۡ أَن لَّن يَبۡعَثَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٗا

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-annahum ẓannū kamā ẓanantum an lan yabʿatha al-lahu aḥadan
